Title: Nightlife-Entertainment
Description: An establishment that provides evening entertainment and usually serves alcoholic beverages. This is a base-level category that should be used for all places that do not fit other categories defined forNightlife-Entertainment (200-2000-xxxx).

Title: Bar or Pub
Description: An establishment that sells alcoholic beverages, such as a public house, sports bar, wine bar or grill. Some places may also serve food or light meals.

Title: Night Club
Description: An establishment that provides evening entertainment, such as a dance club or lounge. Most places are generally open late.

Title: Dancing
Description: An establishment that provides dancing facilities, such as a dance hall, dance studio or other locations containing dance floors.

Title: Karaoke
Description: An establishment that provides karaoke entertainment.

Title: Live Entertainment-Music
Description: An establishment that provides live entertainment acts, such as a comedy club, piano bar or music hall.

Title: Billiards-Pool Hall
Description: An establishment that provides billiards or pool tables.

Title: Video Arcade-Game Room
Description: An establishment that provides video games, pinball machines and other games.

Title: Jazz Club
Description: An establishment that offers live jazz music in a club setting.

Title: Beer Garden
Description: An outdoor area (in most cases) that serves primarily beer, but also provides food and entertainment. They may be attached adjacent to pubs and are usually seasonal.

Title: Adult Entertainment
Description: An establishment that provides live adult entertainment or other types of adult entertainment.

Title: Cocktail Lounge
Description: An establishment where cocktails are served.

Title: Cinema
Description: An establishment that shows movies through screen projection, such as a movie theatre, movie theatre complex or outdoor movie theatre.

Title: Theatre, Music and Culture
Description: An establishment where various types of performing arts are presented. This is a base-level category that should be used for all places that do not fit other categories defined for Theatre, Music and Culture (200-2200-xxxx).

Title: Performing Arts
Description: An establishment where various types of performing arts are presented.

Title: Gambling-Lottery-Betting
Description: An establishment that provides gambling entertainment. This is a base-level category that should be used for all places that do not fit other categories defined for Gambling-Lottery-Betting (200-2300-xxxx).

Title: Casino
Description: An establishment that provides a variety of legal gaming services, such as a casino, riverboat casino or card room.

Title: Lottery Booth
Description: An establishment where lottery tickets are purchased.
